mapper.insert: insert into log (date, username, ip, module, content) values (#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update log set date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module = #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, date, username, ip, module, content from log
